00016 FragModeAi::FragModeAi(PlayManager* playManager) : AIControl(playManager)
00017 {
00018     m_gustCount = 0;
00019 }
00020

00024 
00025 void FragModeAi::Process(Player* player)
00026 {
00027     /*
00028      IA Process Frag :
00029      -----------------
00030 
00031      Rechrche une collision avec la map : isCollidWithMap
00032 
00033      Rechrche un item nécéssaire : m_targetItem
00034 
00035      Si m_targetItem
00036      {
00037         Si isCollidWithMap
00038             addForce = m_targetItem.pos
00039      }
00040 
00041      Sinon
00042      {
00043         Mettre a jour m_tagerPos avec m_targetPlayer
00044 
00045         Si AI_SWITCH_TARGET_TIME || m_minDistToSwitch
00046             Rechreche la cible la plus proche : m_targetPlayer
00047             Mettre a jour m_tagerPos avec m_targetPlayer
00048             Spécifier un vecteur d'attack : m_strikePos
00049 
00050         Si m_targetPos - playerPos < m_minDistToShoot
00051             Tire sur m_targetPos
00052 
00053         Si isCollidWithMap
00054             addForce = m_strikePos
00055 
00056         Si AI_SWITCH_WEAPON_TIME
00057             Changement d'arme
00058      }
00059 
00060      Mouvement vers addForce
00061      */
00062 
00063     const Player::Array& players = m_playManager->GetTargetsOf(player);
00064 
00065     const Item::Array& items = m_playManager->map.items;
00066     //    const StaticObject::Array& staticObjects = m_playManager->map.staticObjects;
00067     const DynamicObject::Array& dynamicObjects = m_playManager->map.dynamicObjects;
00068 
00069     Vector3f addForce;
00070     Vector3f playerPos = player->GetPos();
00071 
00072     // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
00073 
00074     //    bool isCollidWithMap = false;
00075     //
00076     //    for(unsigned i = 0; i < staticObjects.size(); i++)
00077     //        if(isCollidWithMap = player->GetPhysicBody()->IsCollidWith(staticObjects[i]->GetPhysicBody()))
00078     //            break;
00079 
00080     // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
00081 
00082     m_targetOtp = NULL;
00083 
00084     for(unsigned i = 0; i < dynamicObjects.size(); i++)
00085     {
00086         if(dynamicObjects[i]->GetPos() - playerPos < m_aiParams.dynamicInteraction)
00087             m_targetOtp = dynamicObjects[i];
00088     }
00089 
00090     for(unsigned i = 0; i < items.size(); i++)
00091     {
00092         if(items[i]->IsNeeded(player))
00093             m_targetOtp = items[i];
00094     }
00095 
00096     // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
00097 
00098     if(m_targetOtp)
00099     {
00100         addForce = m_targetOtp->GetPos();
00101     }
00102 
00103     else
00104     {
00105         if(m_targetPlayer)
00106             m_targetPos = m_targetPlayer->GetPos();
00107 
00108         if(m_switchTarget.IsEsplanedTime(m_aiParams.switchTargetTime)
00109            || m_strikePos - playerPos < m_minDistToSwith
00110            || !m_targetPlayer
00111            || m_targetPlayer->IsKilled()
00112            )
00113         {
00114             Vector3f minDist = m_mapAABB.max - m_mapAABB.min;
00115 
00116             for(unsigned i = 0; i < players.size(); i++)
00117                 if(!players[i]->IsKilled() && m_mapAABB.IsInner(players[i])
00118                    && players[i]->IsVisibleFromIA())
00119                 {
00120                     Vector3f testedDist = players[i]->GetPos() - playerPos;
00121 
00122                     if(testedDist < minDist)
00123                     {
00124                         minDist = testedDist;
00125                         m_targetPlayer = players[i];
00126                     }
00127                 }
00128 
00129             if(m_targetPlayer)
00130             {
00131                 m_targetPos = m_targetPlayer->GetPos();
00132 
00133                 do
00134                     m_strikePos = tools::rand(m_targetPos - m_strikPrimiter, m_targetPos + m_strikPrimiter);
00135                 while(!m_mapAABB.IsInner(m_strikePos));
00136 
00137                 m_strikePos.y = 0;
00138             }
00139         }
00140 
00141 
00142         addForce = m_strikePos;
00143     }
00144 
00145     if(m_targetPlayer && m_targetPos - playerPos < m_minDistToShoot)
00146     {
00147         Vector3f targetPos = m_targetPos;
00148 
00149         if(m_targetPlayer == m_playManager->GetUserPlayer()
00150            && m_playManager->GetBullettime()->IsActive())
00151         {
00152             Vector3f velocity;
00153             NewtonBodyGetVelocity(m_targetPlayer->GetPhysicBody()->GetBody(), velocity);
00154 
00155             targetPos = m_targetPos - velocity;
00156         }
00157 
00158         if(m_gustCount < m_aiParams.shootGustCount)
00159         {
00160             Vector3f margin = tools::rand(AABB(m_aiParams.shootAccuracy));
00161             if(player->Shoot(m_targetPos + margin))
00162                 m_gustCount++;
00163         }
00164         else if(m_gustClock.IsEsplanedTime(m_aiParams.shootGustTime))
00165             m_gustCount = 0;
00166     }
00167 
00168     if((AABB(-1, 1) + m_lastPos).IsInner(player)
00169        && m_lastPosClock.IsEsplanedTime(2000))
00170     {
00171         do
00172         {
00173             m_strikePos = tools::rand(m_playManager->map.aabb);
00174             m_strikePos.y = 1;
00175             m_strikePos = m_playManager->parallelscene.newton->FindFloor(m_strikePos);
00176         }
00177         while(m_strikePos.y < m_playManager->map.aabb.min.y);
00178 
00179         addForce = m_strikePos;
00180     }
00181     else
00182         m_lastPos = playerPos;
00183 
00184     if(player->GetCurWeapon()->IsEmpty())
00185         player->SwitchUpWeapon();
00186 
00187     addForce = (addForce - playerPos).Normalize() * m_worldSettings.playerMoveSpeed;
00188     addForce.y = 0;
00189 
00190     player->GetPhysicBody()->SetApplyForce(addForce);
00191 }
